description:
Wherever you need more water, this rugged container is up to the job. Made from a burly 400D nylon, the Watercell X is like an armoured version of the Watercell ST. Sea to Summit bonds this tough material with RF welding, creating a seamless bladder. From campsite to emergency kit, the Watercell X will do everything you ask of it.

  • Made from a rugged 400D nylon with the food-grade TPU lining
  • RF welded construction is strong and leakproof
  • Internal baffle design helps the Water Cell hold its shape, even when nearly empty
  • Wide mouth opening for easy filling
  • Pour through cap has and adjustable flow cap, meaning the water goes where you want it
  • Included shower head lets your Water Cell double as a solar shower
  • Shower head attaches to the webbing when not in use, keeping everything together
  • TPU strap is adjustable and works for carrying, hanging, or lashing
  • Hook grip by the spout gives you a secure hold while filling
name: Sea To Summit WaterCell X
